title: Column mapping between source and target table
author: Munendra Singh
description: This asset uses BERT embeddings and cosine similarity to accurately map columns between two different sets of tables. It leverages advanced natural language processing techniques to find the best matches, ensuring seamless data integration.

installDependencyCommands: pip install transformers==4.39.3 torch==2.2.2 minio==7.2.5 scikit-learn==1.4.1.post1 pandas==1.5.3
